GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.10.110
GSD.description:
watch_queue: Fix NULL dereference in error cleanup

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.110 by commit 5ae75b4ed30322b42abaa75ef1b784addfdb7dc9, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit c73be61cede5882f9605a852414db559c0ebedfd. For more details please see the references link.
